item.title: Solr-Go 0.2 released!
item.description: Contents Introduction What’s new? Other changes Thanks! Introduction Solr-Go started as a rudimentary client for interacting with Solr in Go. It was built for maximum flexibility, which sacrificed the usability.

item.title: Generating the repository pattern in Go
item.description: Contents Introduction The downside In search for solutions Enter nero! How to use this library? How to use the generated code?

item.title: Multi-Select Facet with Solr, Vue and Go
item.description: Contents Introduction Indexing and querying The data Defining our schema Indexing the data Query with facet API Implementation Front-end implementation Conclusion References Changelog 02/10/2021: Update examples to use the latest version of solr-go.
